snippet: Ben S. Bernanke faces the growing challenge of shaping investor expectations amid increasing signs that his era as Federal Reserve chairman is ending.
abstract: Federal Reserve chairman Ben S Bernanke faces increasingly difficult challenge of shaping investor expectations about future course of Fed policy amid growing signs that his time at central bank is drawing to close; Pres Obama suggested he is likely to nominate new Fed chairman in coming year.
lead_paragraph: Ben S. Bernanke faces the growing challenge of shaping investor expectations amid increasing signs that his era as Federal Reserve chairman is ending.

headline.main: Uncertainty at Fed Over Its Stimulus Plans and Its Leadership
headline.print_headline: Uncertainty at Fed Over Its Stimulus Plans and Its Leadership
